zapaddon.name: Advanced SQLInjection Scanner
zapaddon.description: An advanced active injection bundle for SQLi (derived by SQLMap)
zapaddon.author: Andrea Pompili (Yhawke)
zapaddon.changes:
Updated for ZAP 2.4
Improved execution time when a WAF or Reverse Proxy is in place disabling keep-alive
Improved the time based statistical model taking in account also some other thresholds
